title: Is my client infected?
body:
When I add a new person in the client I automatically send this message to them:
Hey. I was the person that carried earlier. I was boosting. I thought you might be interested since its cheap atm www.xxxxxx.com/boost
Virus scans show up nothing. How can I get rid of this?

replies.body:
It definitely sounds like you may have had your account compromised by someone. It seems like whoever it was found a way to force your client to send out these messages automatically.

Since you've run your virus software to no avail, it must be something going on with the game files. This may be unfortunate to hear, but my best advice would be to do a full uninstall/reinstall, cleanboot your pc, and see if this still happens after that. 

Also, since it seems like your account in compromised, I would highly suggest reaching out to our account recovery specialists through our [Account Recovery Form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416). They'll be able to help you resecure your account!
